pattern.name: Time part direct
pattern.description:
The hour/day/month of the event.
Note: Some parts of the date/datetime may not be supported by the database or the keywords can be different. For example, day-of-week on PostgreSQL is "dow", but on MSSQL it's "weekday".
Note: It's not meaningful to attempt to extract hour from date column - it's reasonable to extract hour only from datetime.
pattern.author: Jan Motl
